org.jets3t.service.security
Class EncryptionUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.jets3t.service.security.EncryptionUtil

public class EncryptionUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to handle encryption and decryption in the jets3t toolkit.

Properties

The following properties, obtained through Jets3tProperties, are used by this class:

PropertyDescriptionDefault
crypto.algorithm Name of the PBE cryptographic algorithm to use. The algorithms available will depend on the crypto providers installed on a system, and the system's policy file settings. PBEWithMD5AndDES

Constructor Summary
EncryptionUtil(java.lang.String encryptionKey)
          Constructs class configured with the provided password, and set up to use the default encryption algorith PBEWithMD5AndDES.

          Constructs class configured with the provided password, and set up to use the encryption method specified.

Constructor Detail

EncryptionUtil

public EncryptionUtil(java.lang.String encryptionKey,
                      java.lang.String algorithm)
               throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                      javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                      java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
Constructs class configured with the provided password, and set up to use the encryption method specified.

Parameters:
encryptionKey - the password to use for encryption/decryption.
algorithm - the Java name of an encryption algorithm to use, eg PBEWithMD5AndDES
Throws:
java.security.InvalidKeyException
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
